scripts.dev: cross-env-shell USE_MSW=true NODE_ENV=development SESSION_SECRET=whatever HM_SAKSBEHANDLING_API_URL=http://localhost:8083/api GRUNNDATA_API_URL=http://localhost:8083/api BRILLEKALKULATOR_API_URL=http://localhost:8083/api AZURE_APP_WELL_KNOWN_URL=http://host.docker.internal:8080/default/.well-known/openid-configuration ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only src/server.mts
scripts.start: cross-env-shell USE_MSW=true NODE_ENV=development SESSION_SECRET=whatever HM_SAKSBEHANDLING_API_URL=http://localhost:8083/api GRUNNDATA_API_URL=http://localhost:8083/api BRILLEKALKULATOR_API_URL=http://localhost:8083/api AZURE_APP_WELL_KNOWN_URL=http://host.docker.internal:8080/default/.well-known/openid-configuration node dist/server.mjs
